entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 11 April 2023
